trans-unit.source: A collection that stores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> objects.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> class represents the collection of all the styles used to describe the columns in an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> clase representa la colección de todos los estilos utilizados para describir las columnas de un asociado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo establecer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle> para un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo mayor proporcionado para el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
Adds an item to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Add%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Add%2A> método vuelve a aplicar el diseño de tabla a todos los controles actual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> contenedor.

trans-unit.source: The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.
trans-unit.target: El número de estilos almacenada en una colección está limitado únicamente por la memoria disponible.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
The value can be <see langword="null" />.
Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> is in the collection.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
Determines the index of a specific item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
The index of <paramref name="columnStyle" /> if found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />; otherwise, -1.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.IndexOf%2A> method begins searching at the first element of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> and ends either when it finds a match or it reaches the last element.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.IndexOf%2A> método comienza a buscar en el primer elemento de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> y termina cuando se encuentra una coincidencia o cuando llega al último elemento.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> should be inserted.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" /> at the specified position.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Insert%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Insert%2A> método vuelve a aplicar el diseño de tabla a todos los controles actual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> contenedor.

trans-unit.source: The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.
trans-unit.target: El número de estilos almacenada en una colección está limitado únicamente por la memoria disponible.

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> class, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the inserted element.
trans-unit.target: En colecciones de elementos contiguos, como la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> (clase), los elementos que siguen al punto de inserción se desplazan hacia abajo para alojar el elemento insertado.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: También se actualizan los índices de los elementos que se han movido.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> to get or set.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> at the specified index.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> en el índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
The value can be <see langword="null" />.
Removes the first occurrence of a specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Remove%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection.Remove%2A> método vuelve a aplicar el diseño de tabla a todos los controles actual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> contenedor.

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> class, the elements that follow the deletion point move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: En colecciones de elementos contiguos, como la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection> (clase), los elementos que siguen al punto de eliminación ascienden hasta ocupar la posición vacante.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: También se actualizan los índices de los elementos que se han movido.
